pages.text: You have landed in a world with localized $(bold)weather and storms$(reset). $(br)$(br)Natural disasters are rare, but do occur. It is best to protect yourself and your real estate with a $(bold)Weather Deflector.$(reset)

$(bold)One is included in every Starter Hut.$(reset) Simply place it down near the site to be protected and it will just work. No batteries needed. It $(italics)does not$(reset) need to be visible to work, and can be hidden. $(br)$(br)Will not stop the rain, but $(italics)will$(reset) stop a tornado.
Additional Weather Deflectors can be crafted rather inexpensively.
Use the Weather Item to craft.
